Description: On I-395 at mile marker 5.6 in the County of Arlington, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle fire. The south right center lane, right lane, and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Fire

Description: On US-1 North in the County of Dinwiddie, in the vicinity of White Oak Rd; Rt. 613E/W (Dinwiddie County), motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-195 at mile marker 3.3 in the City of Richmond, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The north exit ramp narrows.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-495 at mile marker 44.8 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On Rt. 608 North in the County of Southampton, in the vicinity of Popes Station Rd; Rt. 609E/W (Southampton County), motorists can expect delays due to standing water.
Label: Minor Incident - Standing Water - Advisory

Description: On I-495 at mile marker 54.4 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north exit ramp narrows.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle
